## 50. ASH
### Definition
Ashes as the basic result of combustion of wood, grass, dry dung (not after cremation, as in Russian прах). Not to be confused with special words for “fly ash”, “tobacco ashes”, “volcanic ashes”, or “embers” (hot ashes/coals, cf. context 3). (GLD)

### Contexts
1. The campfire has left only ashes. (GLD) 2. The wind scattered the ashes. (GLD) 3. He scooped up a handful of ashes. (GLD)
